text: Totally missed this notification. I'm just coming back from vacation and found it. I am not going to have any time to review this until friday this week. I've been reworking my gulp script and I'll check in and see how mine works and get back to you
Is anyone having issues on the FTP. When I try and upload any files i just get a 550 error
I can upload fine with FileZilla, but I haven't been able to use FTP with my Gulp tasks for weeks :confused:
If you are creating new folders when you upload or use ftp then HubSpot will reject the request flat.
For me, it's rejecting it regardless of if I'm using existing folders (or even files) or not.
I'm having an issue editing a blog for a client.  when I visit this link I'm getting a js error in the console from app.js <https://app.HubSpot.com/blog/2697635/edit-beta/5390773294/content>
I'm wondering if anyone ran into this before and maybe I should just upgrade them to the design manager beta and then migrate the blog template to the new editor?

you could try this(has bizzarely worked for me in the past with a previous javascript error in the page editor)

toggle on design manager 2(don’t upgrade templates or modules), refresh your blog post and try editing that post again
it might work. Then when you’re done you can safely revert back
there’s a little blue arrow to the bottom right
i'll try this out in the morning to see how this goes
